title: How to Get Debug Mode in Sonic the Hedgehog 2

steps.headline: Go on the Options menu on the title screen.
This is this easy bit, but you need to check the code of practice with music with stuff (just tricking) but you need to press setting with down twice.
On the sound test play the sounds 19, 65, 9 & 17.
steps.description: A sound will confirm this entry. We know, that's the clever bit.

steps.headline: Press start to exit to the title screen.
steps.description: When Sonic & Tails appear press A* and start*, this will take you to the level select screen. The last entry is the sound test.

steps.headline: In the level select sound test, play the following: 1, 9, 9, 2, 1, 1, 2, 4.
steps.description: (This is the date sonic 2 was released). A ring-collected sound will confirm this entry.

steps.headline: For the Super Sonic code enter this on the Level Select sound test: 4, 1, 2, 6.
steps.description: A Chaos Emerald sound will play to confirm this entry.

steps.headline: While a level is highlighted, press A and Start together to play in debug mode.

text: Go on the Options menu on the title screen.  This is this easy bit, but you need to check the code of practice with music with stuff (just tricking) but you need to press setting with down twice.  On the sound test play the sounds 19, 65, 9 & 17. A sound will confirm this entry. We know, that's the clever bit. Press start to exit to the title screen. When Sonic & Tails appear press A* and start*, this will take you to the level select screen. The last entry is the sound test. In the level select sound test, play the following: 1, 9, 9, 2, 1, 1, 2, 4. (This is the date sonic 2 was released). A ring-collected sound will confirm this entry. For the Super Sonic code enter this on the Level Select sound test: 4, 1, 2, 6. A Chaos Emerald sound will play to confirm this entry. While a level is highlighted, press A and Start together to play in debug mode.
